Name: Auto Factory
About the game: In Auto Factory you get to build your own automated factory and then crush, shred, slice, melt and cast materials into lots of different things. You have full creative freedom to build however you like. Construct a simple system out of conveyor belts to move the materials around or if that's too slow for you, make use of all the wacky block types at your disposal such as Cannons and Levitators to get everything moving fast! The only limit is your own imagination in this wacky world of crazy automated assembly !
